segments.text: The kitchen layout is straightforward, with counters and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A woman stands at the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's engaged in drying a dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink has water running, overflowing the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle forming on the floor beneath her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To the left, open cabinet with cookie jar inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy climbs a stool to access it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is inside the jar, other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl nearby, arm extended toward the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Window above sink shows garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked on the counter nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Overall, a domestic setting with subtle disruptions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's oddly captivating how unaware they all seem.
segments.speaker: PAR
